name: SANSKAR VIHAR SOCIETY
briefDescription: SANSKAR VIHAR SOCIETY is known as nationally "SVSOCIETY" is established in 25th October, 2012 as Non-Governmental Organization and principal of organization Volunteering for Indian deprived people, Children and Women. It is Registered Under “SOCIETIES REGISTRATION ACT OF 1860” as applicable to the national capital territory of Delhi. "SVSOCIETY" is a Volunteering based organization. "SVSOCIETY" to develop and encourage all types of cultural and literary activities.
